front.title: IANA Allocation Procedures for OTN Signal Type Subregistry to the GMPLS Signaling Parameters Registry

abstract.t: IANA has defined an "OTN Signal Type" subregistry to the "Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Parameters" registry. This subregistry does not specify experimental or private ranges. This draft proposes changes to OTN Signal Type subregistry to include experimental and private ranges.
